   resourceDefinitions: {
+    factories_adfcdcs: {
+      description: "Microsoft.DataFactory/factories/adfcdcs"
+      properties: {
+        apiVersion: {
+          enum: [
+            "2018-06-01"
+          ]
+          type: "string"
+        }
+        name: {
+          description: "The change data capture name."
+          oneOf: [
+            {
+              maxLength: 260
+              minLength: 1
+              pattern: "^[A-Za-z0-9_][^<>*#.%&:\\\\+?/]*$"
+              type: "string"
+            }
+            {
+              $ref: "https://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/common/definitions.json#/definitions/expression"
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+        properties: {
+          description: "Properties of the change data capture."
+          oneOf: [
+            {
+              $ref: "#/definitions/ChangeDataCapture"
+            }
+            {
+              $ref: "https://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/common/definitions.json#/definitions/expression"
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+        type: {
+          enum: [
+            "Microsoft.DataFactory/factories/adfcdcs"
+          ]
+          type: "string"
+        }
+      }
+      required: [
+        "name"
+        "properties"
+        "apiVersion"
+        "type"
+      ]
+      type: "object"
+    }

       properties: {
